data.message: I thought it was a lyrical gift. But I'm shaky on him bashing Trump and not Hillary at all, there's literally so much he could do with her and her antics. He really stopped being legitimately political after mosh and we as Americans got him into trouble in my opinion. Which sucks because Hillary is, after watching the debate, going to definitely put troops back overseas and instigate tensions with Russia, which is what em advocated against during Bush's reign.

replies.message: *he advocated against sending troops, not anything to do with Russia but still my point stands
